title: Season 6 placement.
body: So i finished season 5 in gold 4, got the banner and skin and everything, and in the preseason i stayed in gold, cant say my mmr was any good but i stayed in gold, i just finished my season 6 placement, i played all 10 first games, i won 8 and lost 2, but i was put in silver 4. so this is kinda demotivating, since it took me a whole season to get to gold in the first place and i was aiming for plat this season, im much better then i was and i won 8 of my 10 games in placement, so why the hell am i in silver4, this really has put me off playing league of legends now, unless something went wrong with riot again.

replies.body:
Left Season 5 Plat V, went 6-4 in and demoted to S 2. Lol I dropped 7 leagues
How the fk is that even possible riot.   Like. Someone definetely messed up here.

I was Plat 5 and went 6/4, dropped to S1, everyone in my S1 ranked games are now PL2-PL5, It's a fucking joke. other friends of mine got exactly the same promo's and dropped to G4, I can deal with a drop to Gold but all the way to silver is just a joke.. How much time does riot think we have to grind LP? It's fucking dull, compounded by the fact that most the people I play with are not silver mmr.. They're all plats who have also dropped to silver.
hey that beats me i went 6/4 from plat 4 and im now silver 3
Same here but I was luckier than you plat5 to silver1
Well i went 4/6 and got plat 5,{{summoner:30}}  SHAME!
That is pretty messed up. 1) you have to grind your way out which is painful for you. 2) you have to steamroll people in silver which is bad for them.

I was Silver V, 4 game win streak, 100LP. Then the season reset, i went 8/2 and got demoted to bronze 1. i had more kills than deaths in every game, and im a support main. Every game i had higher than B+ mastery. I... I don't understand. 3 seasons in a row, i've had to fight my way out of bronze. because i've been demoted during provisionals. I... Im about to quit this trash game.
s5 to b1 makes perfect sense. you're almost always going to be put lower than where you were last season. p5 to s3 is a bit odd, but you're right where you should be
I was silver 5, went 8-2 and demoted to bronze 4! can u feel the rage... so pissed
I was silver 5, went 8-2 an demoted to bronze 3. At least you stayed at B1.

I was b 4 in season 5. Since its a new year i forgot about last season and moved on, after playing 10 placement matches i had won 9 out of 10. i carried in most of the games, also had a lot more kills than deaths. Once i finished my last placement match i got very excited, but quickly went away when it said: CONGRATULATIONS YOU HAVE BEEN PROMOTED TO BRONZE 5. do i deserve to be in a higher division?

can someone please tell me if this is a glitch.

Riot please respond.
It happens every season, if you deserve gold you will get back into it easy {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
if he deserved gold and proved it through passing 80% of his promos, why should be be put into silver in the first place?
This

Seems legit that other players drop a rank or 2, while others drop a whole division

Rito plz

They have a word for that in our language, its called: 'Bullshit'

i had a similar thing happen to me last time and like hell if I'm touching S6 ranked with a 10 ft pole anytime within the next month...

riot can keep their damn IP boosts, you cant bribe me into this shit.
You reckon it is better to wait? Why?

just my own theory but i think it has credit.
As soon as the season resets:

1. all the good people who only play ranked, start straight away, but because everything is re-set and up in the air you are more likely to be matched with them, but after a month or so they will have all gotten promoted back up to their proper levels and you wont have to worry.

2. all the whiny 12 year olds think this is their chance to get gold now that ranked is re-set, they spam their provisionals being dicks to everyone and raging, get bronze 5 throw a tantrum and never touch ranked again till next season, so after a month that has all calmed down and we don't have to deal with them anymore.

3. all the trolls know that everyone is really hyped about ranked and so they come out in force ruining everyones games, but after month they are bored and go back to normals.

4. no-one is quite in the right mmr bracket at the beginning of the season, a gold player might have an unlucky break and lose all 10 provisionals, and get matched with high bronze/low silver, and rape everyone, but after a month all that has settled out and all the good people are way above you again and all the terrible people are way below you again and you can play ranked with people of your own skill level.

5. all the bugs like being stuck at 0 seconds in champ select have been fixed, and the fucked up shit like getting a dodge penalty for not banning or not locking in a champion has become well known and is easier to remember (imagine how many people lost a provisional because they didn't realise you had to 'lock in' a champion) and id rather make these mistakes in the normal queue (when it comes out) rather than in ranked.

6. in under a week's time Jhin and the new Shen will be out and everyone will need to waste 2 bans to stop all the idiots going 'first time jhin' in your provisionals. and i dont want to give the enemy team Miss fortune and Dr. Mundo just to stop some idiot feeding as Jhin.

basically look at it like trying the newly released champion, you don't try them as soon as they come out, because everyone dodges because they didn't get them and throws tantrums and goes the new champ jungle (even if they are a supp) because they instalocked and didnt get their lane. Then the champ is too powerful and it isn't fun for anyone, then they are too weak and it isn't fun for anyone. Theres 2 of them in every game so its mirror lanes all week etc. etc.
its much better to try them out 2 weeks later when eveyone has forgotten that the new champ even exists, they are balanced and you don't have a mirror lane, you know what their abilities are and how powerful they are, and all that.

its like that with ranked, don't play when its all going crazy, play once its all settled back down to normal.
nice theory mate, but remember : {{champion:154}} is love, {{champion:154}} is life XD
I kinda just.... play Ranked whenever I have a spare hour or so... you know lol

I was bronze 1, needed a couple of games to go back to silver, won 7 of the 10 games and got demoted to BRONZE FUCKING 5, then they say CONGRATULATIONS, YOU'VE BEEN "PROMOTED" TO BRONZE 5. now i have to start over, fuck this system
same for me, I ended the season in b2 went 6-4 in placements, nothing under an a+ in every game and then got put in b5, it's actually a fucking joke
I was plat V in S5. Placement went 6/4 and it said: Congratulations you've been promoted to Silver 1. I was like WTF Riot. I can imagine when people demote divisions but the whole tier? Really Riot!

I feel ya I was gold 5 win 4/10 and got silver 3 I expected as much But since then I've already climbed to silver 1 main reason is I'm being put up against golds and because I'm winning those games against them my MMR has been rapidly climbing because I'm earning more LP per win and losing 10-17 per loss so I'm still climbing it's good to be in silver and show that I can climb based on my own personal skills as support and able to carry despite being set back a few positions
Your Preseason MMR plays a large part in your placement.
I was in S5 in S5, S2 in preseason, and now B3 after a shocking bunch of placements (went 5/5)

Same here! I was in bronze 1 last season close to silver and went 8-2. Did great in all the games and got demoted to bronze 4... I understand if they wanna keep you close to last season but 4 tiers down?? At least winning 80% should keep you where you were before??
i  feel ya man i feel ya...{{champion:63}}

I climbed to silver in preseason won 8 of my placements and dropped to b4 
Not going anywhere near ranked this season
